summary: The Certified Digital Marketing Professional course, offered by the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University, is a comprehensive program designed to train skilled digital marketing professionals. The course focuses on digital marketing for startups, AI tools, and digital entrepreneurship. Participants will gain expertise in areas such as digital marketing tools, AI integration in marketing, content creation, website development (WordPress and WIX), organic and paid advertising on search engines and social media, B2B marketing, employer branding, and e-commerce platforms. The program includes practical exercises, case studies, and a final project where students will create and promote websites and campaigns. Graduates will be prepared to take the international Google Ads certification exam and will receive four prestigious certificates from Bar-Ilan University. The course is taught by leading experts with extensive experience in digital marketing, entrepreneurship, and related fields. It is suitable for marketing professionals, business owners, career changers, and discharged soldiers seeking to enter the field. The program spans six months, with classes held twice a week, and includes 200 hours of frontal instruction. Students will also have access to recorded lectures and additional resources. Upon successful completion, participants will receive a certificate from Bar-Ilan University.
full_text:
COURSE NAME: Certified Digital Marketing Professional (שיווק דיגיטלי)

COURSE OVERVIEW: The program is a comprehensive training course designed to prepare participants as skilled digital marketing professionals. It focuses on digital marketing for startups, AI tools, and digital entrepreneurship. Digital marketing is an integral part of the high-tech world, and this course equips participants with the knowledge and skills to market businesses locally and globally. Graduates will be prepared to take the international Google Ads certification exam and embark on a new, exciting career in digital marketing.

TARGET AUDIENCE: The course is aimed at marketing professionals, business owners seeking to enhance their skills, individuals looking for career changes or additional income opportunities, discharged soldiers interested in the field, and entrepreneurs aiming to promote their businesses.

COURSE LEADERSHIP: 
- Program Manager: Mr. Eran Shaham, Director of the School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security at Bar-Ilan University. He has over 30 years of experience in cybersecurity and IT training, managing authorized training centers for leading global companies, and developing advanced certification courses.
- Professional Advisors: Dr. Moshe Yonatani, a digital marketing expert with over a decade of experience, and Mr. Yair Koren, a digital entrepreneur and experienced lecturer in digital marketing.
- Additional Lecturers: 
  - Mr. Roni Applebaum: Expert in marketing writing and copywriting.
  - Ms. Yael Ben Mayor: Specialist in user experience (UX/UI).
  - Mr. Liran Weiss: Expert in e-commerce platforms.
  - Mr. Noam Shaham: Senior lecturer in startup marketing.
  - Mr. Yuval Katz: Senior lecturer in digital entrepreneurship.
  - Ms. Meital Levita: Expert in social media marketing.
  - Ms. Eliana Adler: Specialist in PPC campaigns.

PREREQUISITES: 
- Admission interview with the academic director.
- Preferable experience in marketing, sales, or entrepreneurship.
- Basic knowledge of English.

CERTIFICATIONS: Digital Marketing Expert, Social Media Marketing Expert, PPC Campaign Management Expert, Organic SEO Expert.

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: December 12, 2024.
- Duration: Approximately six months.
- Schedule: Mondays and Thursdays, 17:30–21:30. Additional makeup classes may be scheduled.
- Total Hours: 200 frontal learning hours.

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- Location: School of Hi-Tech and Cyber Security, Bar-Ilan University Campus, Ramat Gan, and online.
- All classes are recorded and available for review.
- Advanced multimedia systems in classrooms.
- Some classes may be conducted via Zoom, depending on university and national guidelines.

TUITION AND FEES: 
- Registration Fee: 480₪.
- Tuition Fee: 12,500₪.
- International certification exam fee is external and separate.

COURSE TOPICS: 
- PART A: Introduction to Digital Marketing and Strategic Marketing Plan (5 hours)
  - Understanding digital marketing concepts.
  - Developing a marketing plan for businesses.
  - Competitor and audience research.
  - Setting goals and objectives using digital tools.
  - Conducting market research with AI tools.

- PART B: Marketing Writing (20 hours)
  - Identifying customer needs.
  - Creating action-driven content.
  - Writing for engagement.
  - Using AI tools for content creation.

- PART C: Building WordPress and Wix Websites (15 hours)
  - Website specification and design.
  - Introduction to WordPress and Wix.
  - Differences between open and closed code systems.
  - Building landing pages, business websites, and e-commerce sites.

- PART D: Organic Search Engine Marketing (30 hours)
  - Understanding Google algorithms.
  - Keyword research and SEO techniques.
  - Google My Business and Google Search Console.
  - YouTube and app promotion (ASO).
  - Using AI for content creation and competitor research.

- PART E: Paid Search Engine Marketing (35 hours)
  - Google Ads campaign creation and optimization.
  - Differences between organic and paid keyword research.
  - Advanced campaign strategies, including AI integration.
  - Preparation for Google Ads certification.

- PART F: Social Media Marketing (30 hours)
  - Overview of social media platforms.
  - Organic vs. paid advertising.
  - Campaign creation for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and more.
  - AI-driven campaign strategies.

- PART G: Pixel and Conversion Workshop (5 hours)
  - Understanding pixels and conversion tracking.
  - Advanced tools for campaign improvement.
  - Introduction to Google Tag Manager.

- PART H: B2B Marketing and Employer Branding (10 hours)
  - LinkedIn networking and advertising.
  - Employer branding strategies.
  - Digital marketing for recruitment.

- PART I: Content Marketing and Distribution Tools (10 hours)
  - Campaign creation with Taboola and Outbrain.
  - Content-based campaign optimization.
  - UX/UI workshop.

- PART J: Optimization and Marketing Automation (20 hours)
  - Tools for digital marketing optimization.
  - Google Analytics and heatmaps.
  - Marketing automation basics.
  - Social media bots.

- PART K: Digital Entrepreneurship and E-Commerce Platforms (20 hours)
  - Overview of e-commerce platforms.
  - Building and managing digital assets.
  - Guest lecture by a digital entrepreneur.

- FINAL PROJECT: 
  - Building a WordPress website.
  - SEO optimization for five keywords.
  - Creating and managing campaigns on Google Ads, Taboola, Outbrain, LinkedIn, and social media.
  - Developing a comprehensive marketing plan with AI tools.
